name: faq_template
description: Frequently asked questions | USE: FAQ, frequently asked questions, common questions, help center, customer support FAQ, help questions | NOT: product promotion, job posting, Q&A session, follower milestone, celebration

samples.title: FAQs
samples.question1: How do I start a return or exchange?
samples.answer1: Email us your order number to initiate the return or exchange process.
samples.question2: What if I received a damaged item?
samples.answer2: Send us photos right away. We'll arrange a replacement or full refund.
samples.answer3: Standard shipping takes 3–7 business days. Express options (1–2 days) are available at checkout.
samples.answer4: Yes! We ship to over 40 countries. Duties and taxes may apply depending on your location.
samples.answer5: You have 30 days from delivery to return unused items in original packaging for a full refund.
samples.question6: How can I track my order?
samples.answer6: You'll receive a tracking link via email as soon as your order ships. Check your inbox or spam folder.
